name: Super Arcade Boy in Defender of Planet Earth
description: A Retro Style Classic Side-Scrolling Shoot'em Up!Super Arcade Boy's Debut!Meet Super Arcade Boy, an arcade champion in the past, and now a planetary freedom fighter. Fly him through 8 levels while defeating waves of enemies and bosses. Have amusing conversations with the aliens you are destined to defeat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
